//: Appears in the refugee center as shopkeeper with missions.  Faction critical.

dynamic_line.yes: Do you want anything from me? I'm a bit busy being at the moment.
dynamic_line.no: Do you want anything from me? I'm a bit busy being at the moment.

responses.text: What is it like being a cook in this station?
Do you have a task for me?
Goodbye, thank you for your time.

dynamic_line.yes: I truly love my job around here. Sure the food might be pretty basic: a few selections of cavehopper meat and farmed potatoes, but it never gets old seeing the look on people's faces when they eat this slop.
dynamic_line.no: I truly love my job around here. Sure the food might be pretty basic: a few selections of cavehopper meat and farmed potatoes, but it never gets old seeing the look on people's faces when they eat this slop.

name.str: Retrieve a copy of Cooking on a Budget.

description: Retrieve a copy of Cooking on a Budget.

dialogue.describe: I'll let you in on a little secret, well perhaps it's not very little. I'm not a very good cook and I think people are starting to become aware of that, could you help me out by finding me a cookbook, it would be a great help.
dialogue.offer: Help me find a copy of the book 'Cooking on a Budget'. I'm not a very good cook, and I could use the knowledge contained within that text.
dialogue.rejected: Ouch, I guess people are gonna have to get used to cave hopper burgers for a long while.
dialogue.advice: Libraries, Schools and Homes might have a cookbook or two, see what you can find.
dialogue.inquire: Have you found what I requested yet?
dialogue.success: Great work, I'll become a master chef in no time.
dialogue.success_lie: That's odd, I don't really know what to say.
dialogue.failure: Well, you did what you could. It's just that food will be as bland as ever.
